title: Dubinik® Flannel Shirt for Men Western Cowboy Pearl Snap Shirts for Men Long Sleeve Vintage Buttons Down Plaid Shirt
description: 【Size Exactly】Dubinik pearl snap shirts for men fit US sizing, if you are not sure what size to buy, please check the size chart according to your usual clothes size. If you like loose shirts, one size up is probably best.

【Washing Advice and Seller Service】Each flannel shirt for men is pre-shrunk during production and does not shrink after washing. Machine washable/hand washable, low temperature ironing works better. If you have any questions, please feel free to click on the store【Dubinik】to contact us.

【High-quality, attention to detail】Men's Flannel Shirts are made of high quality cotton, soft, warm, light and breathable. The skin-friendly material will bring you the ultimate comfortable wearing experience.each of our western shirts for men goes through a strict quality inspection process before shipping, so you don't need to worry about product breakage, buttons falling off, or pilling and shrinking after use.

【Multiple Occasions】Mens flannel shirts long sleeve there are many styles to choose from, green flannel shirt men, purple flannel shirt men, black flannel shirt for men, yellow flannel shirt for men, red mens flannel, brown flannel men, pink flannel shirt men, blue mens flannel, light grey mens shirt.Mens plaid shirt for Spring, Autumn, Winter and Other Seasons, as well as work,party,leisure,trave,motorcycle riding and other occasions.

【Feature】Cowboy shirts for men feature classic western front and back yokes and timeless plaid design, combine with two flap pockets, created a fashion and casual style. This plaid shirt men Features many classic design elements,such as: pearl snap,western,cowboy,vintage,casual, plaid, long sleeves.Mens flannel shirt can be used as a gift for Anniversary, Christmas, All Saints' Day,Carnival, Valentine's Day,Father's Day to those you are close to,such as father, husband,boyfriend,brother,son.
